plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: This app needs access to location for safety monitoring and emergency response.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: This app needs access to location even when closed for continuous safety monitoring.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: This app needs access to location for safety monitoring and emergency response.

plugins.photosPermission: This app needs access to photos to upload KYC documents.
plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs access to camera to capture KYC documents.
